overview: Sex is one of the best things around, so why not share it with a friend? That’s exactly how our girls think and in Private Specials, Loving Threesomes, they’re here to prove it! Veteran Anna Polina returns to action in an interracial threesome with the sexy Hannah Vivienne and along with them we bring you the stunning debut of Scarlett Jones and Shaynna Lover. Meanwhile, Amaris shares a stud with Silvia Soprano and Kylie Green gets it on with her best friend, Tory Sweety. Private Specials, Loving Threesomes, nothing but good vibes, sensual loving, and of course it wouldn’t be Private without some anal too!
title: Loving Threesomes
